About Me

I'm Kenaniah Daniel Sumang, a passionate Software Developer skilled in Python, Java, and full-stack web development. I enjoy creating functional, efficient, and visually engaging digital solutions that deliver great user experiences. Through various web and software projects, I've honed my skills in responsive design, clean coding, and problem-solving. My experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, and SASS has strengthened my attention to detail and commitment to writing maintainable code. I'm continuously expanding my expertise in mobile and game development, driven by a love for innovation and continuous learning.

Let's turn your ideas into Reality

I am the genie of software development. If you need a striking website, or a sleek software that leaves lasting experience, clicking the button is as easy as rubbing the lamp.
